title: The Binding of Isaac: Rebirth Patch v1.01 Update
description:
update only does not include full game or crack

Install instructions: just overwrite old files in install directory with new updated files.
update directory will depend on where you installed it and which release you downloaded.
if you do not know where it is installed right click on the icon on your desktop or in your start menu and go to properties where it says "Start in:" that is the install folder find it and put the files there.

i do not support pirating this game but it is amazing and if you must it should work properly. 

2014-11-07  Patch        1.01
	* Fix crash on using FBO in OpenGL 2 contexts
	* Fix some issues with Steam Cloud Sync
	* Add parameter in Options.ini where you can turn off Steam Cloud
	* Add ALT + F2 shortcut on Stats page to import Steam achievements
	* Fix Haunt staying invulnerable sometimes
	* Fix other gameplay related bugs
	* Fix OS X black screen issue
	* Fix player position when returning from Black Market
	* Fix crash when fighting one of the final bosses
	* Add missing files for Soundtrack DLC
	* Add some lost items to the item pools
	* Fix Xbox 360 controller issues on Linux
